head.#text: II. De Variis Rerum Publicarum Formis

kai\ kratei=n,

tou\s i)sxurota/tous o(rw=men h(goume/nous, le/gw de\ tau/rous, ka/prous, a)lektruo/nas, ta\ tou/tois paraplh/sia.

ta\s me\n ou)=n a)rxa\s ei)ko\s toiou/tous ei)=nai kai\ tou\s
tw=n a)nqrw/pwn bi/ous, zw|hdo\n sunaqroizome/nwn kai\

tw=n e)ktrafe/ntwn ei)s h(liki/an i(ko/menos mh\ ne/moi xa/rin mhd' a)mu/nai tou/tois oi(=s e)ktre/foit', a)lla/ pou

toi=s a)/nw me/resi tou= sw/matos, ou)k ei)=nai d' a)/cion
to\ i(ero\n pu=r fusa=n, u(perbebhke/nai de\ toi=s e)pithdeu/masi ta\ *bo/truos u(pomnh/mata kai\ ta\ *filaini/dos
kai\ tw=n a)/llwn a)naisxuntogra/fwn:

tau/thn de\ th\n
loidori/an kai\ ta\s e)mfa/seis ou)x oi(=on a)/n tis die/qeto
pepaideume/nos a)nh/r, a)ll' ou)de\ tw=n a)po\ te/gous a)po\
tou= sw/matos ei)rgasme/nwn ou)dei/s.

o( d' i(/na pisto\s
fanh=| kata\ th\n ai)sxrologi/an kai\ th\n o(/lhn a)naisxunti/an, kai\ proskate/yeustai ta)ndro/s, kwmiko/n tina
ma/rtura prosepispasa/menos a)nw/numon.

po/qen d'
e)gw\ katastoxa/zomai tou=to; prw=ton me\n e)k tou= kai\
pefuke/nai kai\ teqra/fqai kalw=s *dhmoxa/rhn, a)delfidou=n o)/nta *dhmosqe/nous,

deu/teron e)k tou= mh\
mo/non strathgi/as au)to\n h)ciw=sqai par' *)aqhnai/ois,
a)lla\ kai\ tw=n a)/llwn timw=n, w(=n ou)de\n a)\n au)tw=|
sunece/drame toiau/tais a)tuxi/ais palai/onti.

dio\ kai\
dokei= moi *ti/maios ou)x ou(/tws *dhmoxa/rous kathgorei=n w(s *)aqhnai/wn, ei) toiou=ton a)/ndra proh=gon kai\
toiou/tw| th\n patri/da kai\ tou\s i)di/ous bi/ous e)nexei/rizon.

a)ll' ou)k e)/sti tou/twn ou)de/n. ou) ga\r a)\n
*)arxe/dikos o( kwmw|diogra/fos e)/lege tau=ta mo/nos peri\
*dhmoxa/rous,

w(s *ti/maio/s fhsin, a)lla\ polloi\ me\n
a)\n tw=n *)antipa/trou fi/lwn, kaq' ou(= peparrhsi/astai
polla\ kai\ duna/mena lupei=n ou) mo/non au)to\n *)anti/patron, a)lla\ kai\ tou\s e)kei/nou diado/xous kai\ fi/lous
gegono/tas, polloi\ de\ tw=n a)ntipepoliteume/nwn, w(=n
h)=n kai\ *dhmh/trios o( *falhreu/s.

ou(= 'kei=nos ou) th\n
tuxou=san pepoi/htai kathgori/an e)n tai=s i(stori/ais,
fa/skwn au)to\n gegone/nai toiou=ton prosta/thn th=s
patri/dos kai\ e)pi\ tou/tois semnu/nesqai kata\ th\n
politei/an, e)f' oi(=s a)\n kai\ telw/nhs semnunqei/h ba/nausos.

e)pi\ ga\r tw=| polla\ kai\ lusitelw=s pwlei=sqai
kata\ th\n po/lin kai\ dayilh= ta\ pro\s to\n bi/on u(pa/rxein pa=sin, e)pi\ tou/tois fhsi\ megalauxei=n au)to/n:

kai\ dio/ti koxli/as au)toma/tws badi/zwn prohgei=to th=s
pomph=s au)tw=|, si/alon a)naptu/wn, su\n de\ tou/tois
o)/noi diepe/mponto dia\ tou= qea/trou, dio/ti dh\ pa/ntwn tw=n th=s *(ella/dos kalw=n h( patri\s parakexwrhkui=a toi=s a)/llois e)poi/ei *kassa/ndrw| to\ prostatto/menon, e)pi\ tou/tois au)to\n ou)k ai)sxu/nesqai/ fhsin.

a)ll' o(/mws ou)/te *dhmh/trios ou)/t' a)/llos ou)dei\s ei)rh/

kei peri\ *dhmoxa/rous toiou=ton ou)de/n. e)c w(=n e)gw/,
bebaiote/ran th\n th=s patri/dos h(gou/menos marturi/an
h)\ th\n *timai/ou pikri/an, qarrw=n a)pofai/nomai mhdeni\
to\n *dhmoxa/rous bi/on e)/noxon ei)=nai tw=n toiou/twn
kathgorhma/twn.

kai/per ei) kat' a)lh/qeian u(ph=rxe/
ti toiou=ton a)tu/xhma peri\ *dhmoxa/rhn, poi=os kairo\s
h)\ poi/a pra=cis h)na/gkase *ti/maion tau=ta katata/ttein
ei)s th\n i(stori/an;

kaqa/per ga\r oi( nou=n e)/xontes,
e)pa\n a)mu/nasqai kri/nwsi tou\s e)xqrou/s, ou) tou=to
prw=ton skopou=ntai ti/ paqei=n a)/cio/s e)stin o( plhsi/on, a)lla\ ti/ poiei=n au)toi=s pre/pei, tou=to ma=llon 

 ou(/tws kai\ peri\ tw=n loidoriw=n, ou) ti/ toi=s
e)xqroi=s a)kou/ein a(rmo/zei, tou=to prw=ton h(ghte/on,
a)lla\ ti/ le/gein h(mi=n pre/pei, tou=t' a)nagkaio/taton
logiste/on.

peri\ de\ tw=n pa/nta metrou/ntwn tai=s
i)di/ais o)rgai=s kai\ filotimi/ais a)na/gkh pa/nq' u(popteu/ein e)sti\ kai\ pa=si diapistei=n pe/ra tou= de/ontos
legome/nois.

dio\ dh\ kai\ nu=n h(mei=s me\n ei)ko/tws a)\n
do/caimen a)qetei=n toi=s u(po\ *timai/ou kata\ *dhmoxa/rous ei)rhme/nois:

e)kei=nos d' a)\n ou)k ei)ko/tws tugxa/noi suggnw/mhs ou)de\ pi/stews u(p' ou)deno\s dia\ to\
profanw=s e)n tai=s loidori/ais e)kpi/ptein tou= kaqh/kontos dia\ th\n e)/mfuton pikri/an.

*kai\ ga\r ou)de\ tai=s kat' *)agaqokle/ous e)/gwge loidori/ais, ei) kai\ pa/ntwn ge/gonen a)sebe/statos, eu)dokw=.
le/gw d' e)n tou/tois,

e)n oi(=s e)pi\ katastrofh=| th=s o(/lhs
i(stori/as fhsi\ gegone/nai to\n *)agaqokle/a kata\ th\n
prw/thn h(liki/an koino\n po/rnon, e(/toimon toi=s a)kratesta/tois, koloio/n, trio/rxhn, pa/ntwn tw=n boulome/nwn
toi=s o)/pisqen e)/mprosqen gegono/ta.

pro\s de\ tou/tois,
o(/t' a)pe/qane, th\n gunai=ka/ fhsi kataklaiome/nhn au)to\n
ou(/tws qrhnei=n: "*ti/ d' ou)k e)gw\ se/; ti/ d' ou)k e)me\
su/;

" e)n ga\r tou/tois pa/lin ou) mo/non a)/n tis e)pifqe/gcaito ta\ kai\ peri\ *dhmoxa/rous, a)lla\ kai\ th\n
u(perbolh\n qauma/seie th=s pikri/as.

o(/ti ga\r e)k fu/sews a)na/gkh mega/la proterh/mata gegone/nai peri\
to\n *)agaqokle/a, tou=to dh=lo/n e)stin e)c au)tw=n w(=n o(
*ti/maios a)pofai/netai.

ei) ga\r ei)s ta\s *surakou/sas
paregenh/qh feu/gwn to\n troxo/n, to\n kapno/n, to\n
phlo/n, peri\ e)/th th\n h(liki/an o)ktwkai/deka gegonw/s,

kai\ meta/ tina xro/non o(rmhqei\s a)po\ toiau/ths u(poqe/sews ku/rios me\n e)genh/qh pa/shs *sikeli/as, megi/stous de\ kindu/nous perie/sthse *karxhdoni/ois, te/los
e)gghra/sas th=| dunastei/a| kate/streye to\n bi/on basileu\s prosagoreuo/menos,

a)=r' ou)k a)na/gkh me/ga ti
gegone/nai xrh=ma kai\ qauma/sion to\n *)agaqokle/a kai\
polla\s e)sxhke/nai r(opa\s kai\ duna/meis pro\s to\n
pragmatiko\n tro/pon;

u(pe\r w(=n dei= to\n suggrafe/a
mh\ mo/non ta\ pro\s diabolh\n kurou=nta kai\ kathgori/an e)chgei=sqai toi=s e)piginome/nois, a)lla\ kai\ ta\
pro\s e)/painon h(/konta peri\ to\n a)/ndra: tou=to ga\r
i)/dio/n e)sti th=s i(stori/as.

o( d' e)peskothme/nos u(po\
th=s i)di/as pikri/as ta\ me\n e)lattw/mata dusmenikw=s kai\
met' au)ch/sews h(mi=n e)ch/ggelke, ta\ de\ katorqw/mata
sullh/bdhn parale/loipen,

a)gnow=n o(/ti to\ yeu=dos ou)x
h(=tto/n e)sti peri\ tou\s ta\ gegono/ta  gra/fontas
e)n tai=s i(stori/ais.

h(mei=s de\ to\ me\n e)pimetrei=n th=s
a)pexqei/as au)tou= xa/rin a)fh/kamen, ta\ d' oi)kei=a th=s
proqe/sews au(tw=n ou) parelei/yamen.

*neani/skwn duei=n peri/ tinos oi)ke/tou diaferome/nwn sune/baine para\ me\n to\n e(/teron kai\ plei/w xro/non gegone/nai to\n pai=da,

to\n d' e(/teron h(me/rais
dusi\ pro/teron ei)s to\n a)gro\n e)lqo/nta mh\ paro/ntos
tou= despo/tou meta\ bi/as ei)s oi)=kon a)phxe/nai to\n
dou=lon,

ka)/peita to\n e(/teron ai)sqo/menon e)lqei=n e)pi\
th\n oi)ki/an, kai\ labo/nt' a)pa/gein e)pi\ th\n a)rxh/n, kai\
fa/nai dei=n ku/rion au)to\n ei)=nai dido/nta tou\s e)gguhta/s:

keleu/ein ga\r to\n *zaleu/kou no/mon tou=ton dei=n
kratei=n tw=n a)mfisbhtoume/nwn e(/ws th=s kri/sews par'
ou(= th\n a)gwgh\n sumbai/nei gi/nesqai.

tou= d' e(te/rou
kata\ to\n au)to\n no/mon par' au(tou= fa/skontos gegone/nai th\n a)gwgh/n  e)k ga\r th=s oi)ki/as th=s e)kei/nou to\
sw=ma pro\s th\n a)rxh\n h(/kein a)pago/menon  

tou\s prokaqhme/nous a)/rxontas diaporou=ntas u(pe\r tou= pra/gmatos e)pispa/sasqai kai\ summetadou=nai tw=| kosmopo/lidi.

to\n de\ diastei/lasqai to\n no/mon, fh/santa
para\ tou/twn th\n a)gwgh\n ai)ei\ gi/nesqai, par' oi(=s
a)\n e)/sxaton a)dh/riton h)=| xro/non tina\ gegono\s to\
diamfisbhtou/menon:

e)a\n de/ tis a)felo/menos bi/a| para/
tinos a)paga/gh| pro\s au(to/n, ka)/peita para\ tou/tou
th\n a)gwgh\n o( prou+pa/rxwn poih=tai despo/ths, ou)k
ei)=nai tau/thn kuri/an.

tou= de\ neani/skou deinopaqou=ntos kai\ mh\ fa/skontos ei)=nai tou= nomoqe/tou
tau/thn th\n proai/resin, prokale/sasqai/ fasi to\n
kosmo/polin, ei)/ ti bou/letai le/gein u(pe\r th=s gnw/mhs
kata\ to\n *zaleu/kou no/mon.

tou=to d' e)sti\ kaqisa/ntwn tw=n xili/wn kai\ bro/xwn kremasqe/ntwn le/gein
u(pe\r th=s tou= nomoqe/tou gnw/mhs:

o(po/teros d' a)\n
au)tw=n fanh=| th\n proai/resin e)pi\ to\ xei=ron e)kdexo/menos, to\n toiou=ton dia\ th=s a)gxo/nhs a)po/llusqai
blepo/ntwn tw=n xili/wn.

tau=ta protei/nantos tou=
kosmopo/lidos, to\n neani/skon ei)pei=n fasin a)/nison
ei)=nai th\n sunqh/khn: tw=| me\n ga\r e)/th du/' h)\ tri/a
katalei/pesqai tou= zh=n:

sune/baine ga\r ei)=nai to\n
kosmo/polin ou) polu\ lei=pon tw=n e)nenh/kont' e)tw=n:
au(tw=| de\ tou= bi/ou to\ plei=on e)k tw=n eu)lo/gwn e)/ti
me/nein.

o( me\n ou)=n neani/skos ou(/tws eu)trapeleusa/menos e)ce/luse th\n spoudh/n, oi( d' a)/rxontes e)/krinan th\n a)gwgh\n kata\ th\n tou= kosmopo/lidos gnw/mhn.

head.#text: V. De Callisthenis Imperitia In Narrandis Rebus Militaribus

p.#text:
*(/ina de\ mh\ do/cwmen tw=n thlikou/twn a)ndrw=n
kataciopistei=sqai, mnhsqhso/meqa mia=s parata/cews,
h(\n a(/ma me\n oi(/an e)pifanesta/thn ei)=nai sumbe/bhken,
a(/ma de\ toi=s kairoi=s ou) makra\n a)phrth=sqai, to\ de\
me/giston, parateteuxe/nai to\n *kallisqe/nh.

le/gw de\
peri\ th=s e)n *kiliki/a| genome/nhs *)aleca/ndrw| pro\s
*darei=on, e)n h(=| fhsi\ me\n *)ale/candron h)/dh diapeporeu=sqai ta\ stena\ kai\ ta\s legome/nas e)n th=| *kiliki/a|
*pu/las, *darei=on de\ xrhsa/menon th=| dia\ tw=n *)amani/dwn legome/nwn *pulw=n porei/a| kata=rai meta\ th=s
duna/mews ei)s *kiliki/an:

puqo/menon de\ para\ tw=n
e)gxwri/wn proa/gein to\n *)ale/candron w(s e)pi\ *suri/an,
a)kolouqei=n, kai\ suneggi/santa toi=s stenoi=s stratopedeu=sai para\ to\n *pi/naron potamo/n.

ei)=nai de\ tou=
me\n to/pou to\ dia/sthm' ou) plei/w tw=n tetta/rwn kai\
de/ka stadi/wn a)po\ qala/tths e(/ws pro\s th\n parw/reian:

dia\ de\ tou/tou fe/resqai to\n proeirhme/non
potamo\n e)pika/rsion, a)po\ me\n tw=n o)rw=n eu)qe/ws
e)krh/gmata tw=n pleurw=n, dia\ de\ tw=n e)pipe/dwn e(/ws
ei)s qa/lattan a)poto/mous e)/xonta kai\ dusba/tous lo/fous.

tau=ta d' u(poqe/menos, e)pei\ suneggi/zoien oi(
peri\ to\n *)ale/candron e)c u(postrofh=s e)p' au)tou\s
a)naxwrou=ntes, kri=nai/ fhsi *darei=on kai\ tou\s h(gemo/nas th\n me\n fa/lagga ta/cai pa=san e)n au)th=| th=|
stratopedei/a|, kaqa/per e)c a)rxh=s ei)=xe, xrh/sasqai de\
tw=| potamw=| problh/mati dia\ to\ par' au)th\n r(ei=n th\n
stratopedei/an.

meta\ de\ tau=ta/ fhsi tou\s me\n i(ppei=s ta/cai para\ qa/lattan, tou\s de\ misqofo/rous
e(ch=s tou/tois par' au)to\n to\n potamo/n, e)xome/nous
tou/twn tou\s peltasta\s suna/ptontas toi=s o)/resi.

pw=s de\ proe/tace tou/tous pro\ th=s fa/laggos, tou=
potamou= r(e/ontos par' au)th\n th\n stratopedei/an,
dusxere\s katanoh=sai, kai\ tau=ta tw=| plh/qei tosou/twn u(parxo/ntwn.

trismu/rioi me\n ga\r i(ppei=s u(ph=rxon, w(s au)to\s o( *kallisqe/nhs fhsi/, trismu/rioi de\
misqofo/roi: po/sou d' ei)=xon ou(=toi to/pou xrei/an,
eu)xere\s katamaqei=n.

plei=ston me\n ga\r i(ppe/wn ta/ttetai ba/qos e)p' o)ktw\ pro\s a)lhqinh\n xrei/an, kai\
metacu\ tw=n i)lw=n e(ka/sths i)/son u(pa/rxein dei= dia/sthma toi=s metw/pois pro\s to\ tai=s e)pistrofai=s du/nasqai kai\ toi=s perispasmoi=s eu)xrhstei=n.

e)c w(=n
to\ sta/dion o)ktakosi/ous lamba/nei, ta\ de\ de/ka tou\s
o)ktakisxili/ous, ta\ de\ te/ttara trisxili/ous diakosi/ous, w(/st' a)po\ tw=n muri/wn xili/wn diakosi/wn
peplhrw=sqai to\n tw=n tettareskai/deka stadi/wn
to/pon.

e)a\n de\ pa/ntas e)kta/tth| tou\s trismuri/ous,
braxu\ lei/pei tou= trifalaggi/an e)pa/llhlon ei)=nai
tw=n i(ppe/wn au)tw=n.

ei)s poi=on ou)=n to/pon e)ta/tteto
to\ tw=n misqofo/rwn plh=qos; ei) mh\ nh\ *di/a kato/pin
tw=n i(ppe/wn. a)ll' ou)/ fhsin, a)lla\ sumpeptwke/nai
tou/tous toi=s *makedo/si kata\ th\n e)pagwgh/n.

e)c w(=n
a)na/gkh poiei=sqai th\n e)kdoxh\n dio/ti to\ me\n h(/misu
tou= to/pou to\ para\ qa/lattan h( tw=n i(ppe/wn e)pei=xe
ta/cis, to\ d' h(/misu to\ pro\s toi=s o)/resin h( tw=n
misqofo/rwn.

e)k de\ tou/twn eu)sullo/giston po/son
u(ph=rxe to\ ba/qos tw=n i(ppe/wn kai\ poi=on e)/dei to/pon
a)pe/xein to\n potamo\n a)po\ th=s stratopedei/as.

meta\
de\ tau=ta suneggizo/ntwn tw=n polemi/wn fhsi\ to\n
*darei=on au)to/n, kata\ me/shn u(pa/rxonta th\n ta/cin,
kalei=n tou\s misqofo/rous a)po\ tou= ke/ratos pro\s
au(to/n.

pw=s de\ le/getai tou=to, diaporei=n e)/sti: tw=n
ga\r misqofo/rwn a)na/gkh kai\ tw=n i(ppe/wn th\n sunafh\n kata\ me/son u(pa/rxein to\n to/pon, w(/st' e)n
au)toi=s w)\n toi=s misqofo/rois o( *darei=os pou= kai\
pro\s ti/ kai\ pw=s e)ka/lei tou\s misqofo/rous;

to\ de\
teleutai=o/n fhsi tou\s a)po\ tou= deciou= ke/ratos i(ppei=s
e)pagago/ntas e)mbalei=n toi=s peri\ to\n *)ale/candron,
tou\s de\ gennai/ws decame/nous a)ntepa/gein kai\ poiei=n
ma/xhn i)sxura/n.

o(/ti de\ potamo\s h)=n e)n me/sw|, kai\
potamo\s oi(=on a)rti/ws ei)=pen, e)pela/qeto.

*tou/tois d' e)sti\ paraplh/sia ta\ kata\ to\n *)ale/candron. fhsi\ ga\r au)to\n poih/sasqai th\n ei)s th\n
*)asi/an dia/basin, pezw=n me\n e)/xonta te/ttaras muria/das, i(ppei=s de\ tetrakisxili/ous kai\ pentakosi/ous,

me/llonti d' ei)s *kiliki/an e)mba/llein a)/llous e)lqei=n
e)k *makedoni/as pezou\s me\n pentakisxili/ous, i(ppei=s
d' o)ktakosi/ous.

a)f' w(=n ei)/ tis a)fe/loi trisxili/ous
me\n pezou/s, triakosi/ous d' i(ppei=s, e)pi\ to\ plei=on
poiw=n th\n a)pousi/an pro\s ta\s gegenhme/nas xrei/as,
o(/mws pezoi\ me\n a)poleifqh/sontai tetrakismu/rioi
disxi/lioi, pentakisxi/lioi d' i(ppei=s.

tou/twn ou)=n
u(pokeime/nwn, fhsi\ to\n *)ale/candron puqe/sqai th\n
*darei/ou parousi/an ei)s *kiliki/an e(kato\n a)pe/xonta
stadi/ous a)p' au)tou=, diapeporeume/non h)/dh ta\ stena/:

dio/per e)c u(postrofh=s pa/lin poiei=sqai th\n porei/an
dia\ tw=n stenw=n, a)/gonta prw=ton me\n th\n fa/lagga,
meta\ de\ tau=ta tou\s i(ppei=s, e)pi\ pa=si to\ skeuofo/ron.
a(/ma de\ tw=| prw=ton ei)s ta\s eu)ruxwri/as e)kpesei=n,

diaskeua/zesqai paraggei/lanta pa=sin e)piparembalei=n th\n fa/lagga, kai\ poih=sai to\ ba/qos au)th=s e)pi\
tria/konta kai\ du/o, meta\ de\ tau=ta pa/lin ei)s e(kkai/deka, to\ de\ teleutai=on, e)ggi/zonta toi=s polemi/ois,
ei)s o)ktw/.

tau=ta d' e)sti\ mei/zw tw=n proeirhme/nwn
a)logh/mata. tou= ga\r stadi/ou lamba/nontos a)/ndras
e)n toi=s poreutikoi=s diasth/masin, o(/tan ei)s e(kkai/deka
to\ ba/qos w)=si, xili/ous e(cakosi/ous, e(ka/stou tw=n
a)ndrw=n e(\c po/das e)pe/xontos,

fanero\n o(/ti ta\ de/ka
sta/dia lh/yetai muri/ous e(cakisxili/ous, ta\ d' ei)/kosi
tou\s diplasi/ous.

e)k de\ tou/twn eu)qew/rhton o(/ti
kaq' o(\n kairo\n e)poi/hse th\n du/namin *)ale/candros
e(kkai/deka to\ ba/qos, a)nagkai=on h)=n ei)/kosi stadi/wn
u(pa/rxein to\ tou= to/pou dia/sthma kai\ peritteu/ein
e)/ti tou\s me\n i(ppei=s pa/ntas, tw=n de\ pezw=n muri/ous.

duname/nous tou\s par' au(tou= ste/gein th\n th=s fa/laggos e)/fodon, a)ll' e)kpiezoume/nous tou\s e)pi\ tw=n
eu)wnu/mwn, kai\ tou\s me\n a)polwlo/tas h)/dh, tou\s d'
e)pi\ po/da poioume/nous th\n a)naxw/rhsin, e)n de\ toi=s

oi( de\ *makedo/nes, ou)/te to\n paraggelou=nt'
e)/xontes ou)/te susth=nai duna/menoi kai\ labei=n to\ th=s
fa/laggos i)/dion sxh=ma dia/ te ta\s tw=n to/pwn dusxerei/as kai\ dia\ to\ toi=s a)gwnizome/nois e(po/menoi
porei/as e)/xein dia/qesin kai\ mh\ parata/cews,

ou)de\
prosede/canto tou\s *(rwmai/ous ei)s ta\s xei=ras e)/ti, di'
au)tw=n de\ tw=n qhri/wn ptohqe/ntes kai\ diaspasqe/ntes e)ne/klinan.

tw=| ba/rei to\ sfe/teron eu)w/numon, a)polipw\n tou\s

prose/balle kata\ nw/tou toi=s *makedo/si.

bohqei=n,

o( de\ *fi/lippos e)n me\n tai=s a)rxai=s,

tou= kindu/nou met' o)li/gwn i(ppe/wn kai\ pezw=n suneqew/rei ta\ o(/la.

to\ di/wgma tou= laiou= ke/rws toi=s a)/krois h)/dh prospela/zontas, e)gi/neto pro\s to\ feu/gein, o(/sous e)du/nato plei/stous e)k tou= kairou= sunaqroi/sas tw=n

pro\s tou\s e(ptakosi/ous: tw=n de\ *makedo/nwn a)pe/qanon me\n oi( pa/ntes ei)s o)ktakisxili/ous, zwgri/a| d'

*kai\ th=s me\n e)n *qettali/a| genome/nhs peri\ *kuno\s
*kefala\s *(rwmai/wn kai\ *fili/ppou ma/xhs toiou=ton

p.#text:
a)pe/bh to\ te/los: e)gw\ de\ kata\ me\n th\n e(/kthn bu/blon
e)n e)paggeli/a| katalipw\n o(/ti labw\n to\n a(rmo/zonta
kairo\n su/gkrisin poih/somai tou= kaqoplismou= *(rwmai/wn kai\ *makedo/nwn, o(moi/ws de\ kai\ th=s sunta/cews
th=s e(kate/rwn, ti/ diafe/rousin a)llh/lwn pro\s to\
xei=ron kai\ ti/ pro\s to\ be/ltion, nu=n e)p' au)tw=n tw=n
pra/cewn peira/somai th\n e)paggeli/an e)pi\ te/los a)gagei=n.

e)pei\ ga\r h( me\n *makedo/nwn su/ntacis e)n toi=s
pro\ tou= xro/nois, di' au)tw=n tw=n e)/rgwn didou=sa
th\n pei=ran, e)kra/tei tw=n te kata\ th\n *)asi/an kai\
tw=n *(ellhnikw=n sunta/cewn, h( de\ *(rwmai/wn tw=n te
kata\ th\n *libu/hn kai\ tw=n kata\ th\n *eu)rw/phn prosesperi/wn e)qnw=n a(pa/ntwn,

e)n de\ toi=s kaq' h(ma=s
kairoi=s ou)x a(/pac, a)lla\ pleona/kis ge/gone tou/twn
tw=n ta/cewn kai\ tw=n a)ndrw=n pro\s a)llh/lous dia/krisis,

xrh/simon kai\ kalo\n a)\n ei)/h to\ th\n diafora\n
e)reunh=sai, kai\ para\ ti/ sumbai/nei *(rwmai/ous e)pikratei=n kai\ to\ prwtei=on e)kfe/resqai tw=n kata\ po/lemon a)gw/nwn,

i(/na mh\ tu/xhn le/gontes mo/non makari/zwmen tou\s kratou=ntas a)lo/gws, kaqa/per oi( ma/taioi
tw=n a)nqrw/pwn, a)ll' ei)do/tes ta\s a)lhqei=s ai)ti/as e)painw=men kai\ qauma/zwmen kata\ lo/gon tou\s h(goume/nous.

*peri\ me\n ou)=n tw=n pro\s *)anni/ban a)gw/nwn gegono/twn *(rwmai/ois kai\ tw=n e)n tou/tois e)lattwma/twn
ou)de\n a)\n de/oi plei/w le/gein: ou) ga\r para\ to\n kaqoplismo\n ou)de\ para\ th\n su/ntacin, a)lla\ para\ th\n
e)pidecio/thta th\n *)anni/bou kai\ th\n a)gxi/noian perie/pipton toi=s e)lattw/masi.

me\n to\ te/los tou= pole/mou: prosgenome/nou ga\r strathgou= toi=s *(rwmai/ois paraplhsi/an du/namin e)/xontos
*)anni/ba|, taxe/ws kai\ to\ nika=n sunechkolou/qhse toi=s
proeirhme/nois:

th=s o(/lhs fa/laggos e)/fodon kai\ probolh/n, poi/an

me\n ou)=n e)n trisi\ posi\ meta\ tw=n o(/plwn kai\ *(rwmai=oi:

kata\ du/o prwtosta/tas tw=n falaggitw=n, w(/ste pro\s

tou/tous mh\ sugkatabai/nwsi, periporeuo/menoi de\

e(po/menoi toi=s u(poxwrou=sin h)\ feu/gontes tou\s proskeime/nous a)polei/pousi ta\ loipa\ me/rh th=s oi)kei/as

*ma/rkos, au)to\s e)piqumw=n th=s ei)s th\n *(ella/da diaba/sews, a)nte/lege kai\ pollh\n e)poiei=to spoudh\n ei)s

o(/lwn.

"

*korinqi/ous, *fwke/as, *lokrou/s, *eu)boei=s, *)axaiou\s

tine\s me\n ou)d' h)/kousan tou= khru/gmatos, tine\s de\

a)nqrw/pwn diapistou/menon kai\ dokou=n w(s a)\n ei)

Polybius Achivus quamvis tunc in Africa cum
Scipione fuerit, tamen quia domesticam cladem ignorare non potuit, semel in Achaia pugnatum Critolao
